title: Joe Biden – 2021 Comments on Trump Supporters Attacking the Capitol Building
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Joe Biden, the US President-Elect, on 6 January 2021.
content: Let me be very clear: the scenes of chaos at the Capitol do not represent who we are. What we are seeing is a small number of extremists dedicated to lawlessness. This is not dissent, it’s disorder. It borders on sedition, and it must end. Now.
